metadata.Title: CVE-2022-39177 on Ubuntu 14.04 LTS (trusty) - medium.
metadata.Description: BlueZ before 5.59 allows physically proximate attackers to cause a denial of service because malformed and invalid capabilities can be processed in profiles/audio/avdtp.c.

notes.Note: rodrigo-zaiden> this and CVE-2022-39176 tracked in same LP bug

criterions.comment: bluez: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
